alert.note: Alert for Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 05 at 10:42AM EST until February 07 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Williamsburg affecting Whitley County. For the Cumberland River...including Cumberland, Baxter, Pineville, Barbourville, Williamsburg...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Williamsburg. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Saturday the stage was 17.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.2 feet this evening. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by Saturday Evening.
